files.description: CLI script that discovers agent-specific artifact files, copies them into the canonical outputs/ directory with collision-safe naming, and generates/updates outputs/index.md linking to all promoted outputs.
Python configuration module defining the default discovery rules (agent directory patterns, file allowlist/denylist, destination naming policy, and index formatting) used by the promotion CLI.
Package marker enabling reliable imports for the output promotion tooling.
Canonical index of all files in outputs/ with stable Markdown links, initially scaffolded and intended to be regenerated by the promotion tool.
Documentation explaining why audits report 0 documents, how the promotion tool consolidates agent artifacts into outputs/, and how outputs/index.md is generated and maintained.

missionDescription: Promote/consolidate existing artifacts created under agent-specific directories (e.g., README.md, first_artifact.md, research_template.md) into canonical /outputs/ and add /outputs/index.md linking to all outputs. Audit currently reports 0 documents, implying outputs are not landing where the audit expects.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Work products exist but are not recognized in the deliverables audit; consolidation into /outputs is necessary to close the '0 documents' gap.
